name: Quinoa Burgers
description: Go meatless at least once a week. Here is a super-grain recipe that is easy to make.
preparation: In a large mixing bowl, combine all ingredients except oil.
Form mixture into four 3⁄4‚Äù thick patties (dip hands in water to prevent sticking). If too soft, refrigerate for 10 minutes.
In a frying pan, heat oil over medium. Cook burgers for 8-10 minutes per side, until browned and cooked through.
